attributes.action: Mandatory Life Driving Bans For Dangerous or Intoxicated Drivers Who Cause Death or Serious Injury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change sentencing policy so that all drivers who cause death or serious injury, because of dangerous driving or driving whilst intoxicated will receive a mandatory life driving ban.

In addition all driving bans issued under any circumstances (including banned juveniles) will be backed up by a suspended jail sentence (minimum 1 year).  Drivers found to have breached the ban will serve the jail term.

This will make roads safer, save police time and improve morale, close a legal loop hole, where current bans have no effect, reduce insurance costs and serve as a robust deterant effect.
